articles.title: Narayan Jagadeesan Reveals Batting Mantra After Record-Smashing Knock In Vijay Hazare Trophy - NDTV Sports
articles.description: In the form of his life, Narayan Jagadeesan on Monday smashed a world record breaking 277, the highest List A score ever, to fire Tamil Nadu to an incredible 435-run win over Arunachal Pradesh in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy.
articles.content: Narayan Jagadeesan's mantra to success is quite simple: stay in the middle and bat till the 50 overs. In the form of his life, Jagadeesan on Monday smashed a world record breaking 277, the highest Li… [+3520 chars]
